titleStmt.title: Some thoughts concerning the several causes and occasions of atheism, especially in the present age with some brief reflections on Socinianism, and on a late book entitled, The reasonableness of Christianity as delivered in the Scriptures / by John Edwards ...
titleStmt.author: Edwards, John, 1637-1716.

notesStmt.note: The reasonableness of Christianity (1695) is by John Locke.
